name: Graveyard Mayhem
description:
Unleash mayhem in this Zombie-Action FPS.

Defeat an endless onslaught of zombies and try to survive as long as possible. Choose your weapon from pump-action shotgun to Gatling-Gun. Choose your favorite and bring as many zombies back to the grave!

Oh, ... And you don't have to pay for property damage!

PLEASE, Consider playing the downloadable version if there are any performance issues.
